title: Married female assistant principal 'repeatedly had sex with student'
text:
An assistant principal in North Carolina has been arrested and charged with having a half-dozen sexual encounters with a student earlier this year.

Lisa Renee Rothwell, 34, was taken into custody on Friday and booked into the Gaston County Jail on six felony counts of sex offense with a student.

Rothwell has worked at Gaston County Schools for a decade, most recently as assistant principal at Stuart Cramer High School in Belmont, earning more than $66,000 a year.

Rothwell has worked at Gaston County Schools for a decade, most recently as assistant principal at Stuart Cramer High School in Belmont (pictured)

Rothwell's husband, Joe Rothwell, is a math and English teacher at WC Friday Middle School. According to his biography posted online, the couple have been married since 2009.

The Gaston Gazette reports authorities in arrest warrants filed Friday accused Lisa Rothwell of having sexual intercourse and oral sex with the student six times between April and July 2019. It is unclear if the alleged victim is still a student.

Channel 9 reported that according to investigators, Rothwell began tutoring the victim last school year.

Rothwell is married, and her husband, Joe, works as a math teacher in the same school distrcit as his wife

Three of the sexual encounters between the married assistant principle and the student took place in April, and the other three in July. Each tryst involved two sex acts.

Rothwell's arrest came just days after police first learned of the allegations against the educator from chatter between students on campus.

During her initial court appearance on Friday, a judge set Rothwell's bond at $1million after alerting her to the seriousness of the charges against her.

In the wake of Rothwell's arrest, the school has placed her on paid administrative leave, but her name has been removed from the online staff directory.

Rothwell is a native of Michigan who earned a Master’s degree from Appalachian State University.

She joined the staff at Stuart Cramer High School in 2014 as an exceptional children teacher, and a year later was elevated to the position of assistant principal.
description: Lisa Rothwell, a 34-year-old assistant school principal from North Carolina, has been arrested on six felony counts of sex offense with a student involving intercourse and oral sex.
